metadata.synopsis: One-liner child, part of a family trio.Player has entered their family home unbidden (family may otherwise turn up dead - killed by a mind flayer the player failed to stop earlier. Here this is not the case, and the potential victim is oblivious to what might have happened).
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to S_LOW_WindmillMindflayerFollowup_Child - 36c1ce47-4d87-4520-9094-e4dc8008cffd - (20 43 -5)

0.speaker: Ayo Armbrust
0.text: Mama keeps telling Papa we need a lock on our door. I suppose this explains why.

1.speaker: Ayo Armbrust
1.text: Hello! Are you a tax collector? Papa told me I shouldn't talk to them if they showed up.
